A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A tired idea that really goes no where within the canon and deviates from any coherent direction other than down. Also\, a side note\, the gender politics in this movie are very obvious. As if Hollywood believes that the audience is oblivious to these tactics. Its very obvious and therefor detracts from any sense of reality that these movies were good at creating in the original series\, a \"believable\" universe if you will. Politics really needs to get out of the film industry\, it's just cringe at this point.
